title: He Had A Real Wife And A Fake Wife
itunes:title: He Had A Real Wife And A Fake Wife
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been with a liar for 7 years and I thought we had been married for 3 years. When we first met, he told me that he is an only child. 3 months into our relationship, I went by his mom’s house to drop something off for him and there was a woman sitting on the porch with 2 little girls. I got home and asked my man who the woman and the girls were. He said it was his sister and her daughters and they’re staying with his mom for a little while...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
